info.title: Edit page
info.text: Manage basic page information by clicking on one of the 4 categories below

1.title: Information
1.text: Please tell us about the person you lost.
1.input-firstname-placeholder: First name of your loved one
1.input-lastname-placeholder: Last name of your loved one

2.title: Make it personal
2.text: This is the photo and message your close ones will see on the page.
2.label-intro:
Write a message to inform relatives of the passing.
 No need to include information about the funeral - we'll take care of that later.
2.text-image: You can complete this step later if you do not have the right picture now, but we highly recommend that you include a picture before sharing the page. Accepted formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG (max size: 5 MB).
templates:
Dear loved ones, 

As some of you may already know, our dear {{firstname, capitalize}} has left this world {{dod, capitalize}}, having lived {{age}} beautiful years. This page is destined for you all, to share your warm words of support with us and with one another during this period of darkness. We encourage you to share memories and photos of moments lived with {{firstname, capitalize}}. 

All our love.
It is with a heavy heart we share with you the news of {{fullname}}'s passing, {{dod, capitalize}}.

Dear friends and family, 

It is with great sadness that I share the news of [my father, my mother, my partner, my brother, my sister,...] {{firstname, capitalize}} death, having taken place {{dod, capitalize}}.

3.title: Celebration
3.text: Specify the date and location of planned memorial ceremonies and the person guests may reach out to.

4.title: Donations
4.text: Organize a donation to support a cause that was close to your loved one's heart.
4.description: You can organize a donation drive to support an organization that was close to {{fullname}}'s heart, or to help the family pay for funeral expenses. Donations allow the entourage to express their support in a meaningful way.
4.label-message: Your message to introduce the fundraising
4.input-message-placeholder: Write a few lines that explain what this cause means to you & your family. It will encourage others to donate to it.

family: Our family would like to honor our {{firstname, capitalize}} by organizing a fundraiser.
{{firstname, capitalize}} was never into sympathy bouquets, so instead, for those who would like to show their support, we are raising funds in their memory.
We have organized a fundraiser in memory of {{firstname, capitalize}}. The funds raised will go to covering at least partially the costs of the memorial services. Infinite thanks for your generosity.
org:
{{firstname, capitalize}} dedicated their life to serving a greater good, working with {{org}}. avec toujours ce soucis de rendre le monde meilleur et d’aider son prochain.

Nous souhaitons poursuivre ce combat en sa mémoire et organisons une collecte de dons pour soutenir, en son nom, cette association qui lui tenait tellement à coeur. Nous pensons que c’est ce que {{firstname, capitalize}} aurait souhaité. Merci d’avance de votre générosité.

As some of you know, our dear {{firstname, capitalize}} was taken by (nom de la maladie) after years of heroic struggle. In memory of {{firstname, capitalize}} and all those brave souls fallen to this terrible malady, we would like to raise funds for {{org}} to discover treatments and, one day, a cure to save countless future lives. Thank you for supporting us in a mission so close to our hearts.

Helping others was the main driving force of {{firstname, capitalize}}'s life. This energy was evident most strongly in the work they had dedicated to {{org}}. Together and in memory to their compassionate and charitable soul, let us continue their mission and support the organization's work.  et soutenons cette association. Thank you for your generosity.

4.text-status: The family has begun a fundraiser, proceeds going to {{org}}. To date, the total funds raised is {{total}}. You can deactivate or close the fundraiser to hold the funds.

places.label-privacy: Will be held in intimate family setting

contacts.title: Who should relatives reach out if they need more information?

messages.title: Manage messages
messages.text: View and manage all messages and pictures posted on the page
messages.text-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

stats.title: Statistics
stats.text: to send the link of this page to family, friends and colleagues
